thread.title: Present Scenario and Growth Prospects of Global Mobile M2M Module Market 2015-2019
thread.title_full: Present Scenario and Growth Prospects of Global Mobile M2M Module Market 2015-2019 | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Present Scenario and Growth Prospects of Global Mobile M2M Module Market 2015-2019
text:
(MENAFN Press) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Illinois – United States – July 012015 (PR Buzz): Global Mobile M2M Module Market 2015-2019  is a new market research publication announced by Reportstack. Mobile M2M module is a chip embedded in smart devices which enables the data transmission and communication between electronic devices. With the emergence of IoT and M2M technology there is growing demand for mobile M2M module for data transmission purposes. Mobile M2M module is used for two classes of interconnections: short-range and wide area. For wide area interconnection embedded M2M module is used to connect remote devices to the internet and application servers.  For short-range interconnection embedded short-range wireless M2M modules are used which follow a wide range of protocols and frequency bands depending on the applications and regional spectrum regulatory constraints. Embedded short-range M2M modules operate in license-free ISM frequency bands such as 169 MHz 433 MHz 868 MHz 915 MHz and 2.4 GHz. 

The analysts forecast that the global mobile M2M module market to grow at a CAGR of 20.37% over the period 2015-2019. 
To view the table of contents and know more details please visit . 

Covered in this Report 
The report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global mobile M2M module market for the period 2015-2019. On the basis of technology the market can be classified into three: 2G 3G and LTE.

The report Global Mobile M2M Module Market 2015-2019 has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. It covers the market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market.
